conversation: Please multply the result of that by 20.
There are about 4,000 people through the summer months and about 1,000 overwinter each year.
1.reference: The Arctic is home to almost four million people today - Indigenous Peoples, more recent arrivals, hunters and herders living on the land and city dwellers. Roughly 10 percent of the inhabitants are Indigenous and many of their peoples distinct to the Arctic.
